original_title: Joe Bonamassa: 32 Bleu Live from Colorado Springs, CO
overview: Joe Bonamassa - Live in Colorado Springs, CO on March 31, 2003. title: Joe Bonamassa: 32 Bleu Live from Colorado Springs, CO
